author: Ashlea Ebeling
title: Strive for the max. - In Photos: 10 Moves To Juice Your 401(k) - Forbes
text:
10 Moves To Juice Your 401(k)
The maximum amount an individual can save in a 401(k) for2016 is $18,000 a year, or $24,000 if you're 50 or older, unchanged from 2015. If that's attainable, go for it. If these limits sound like a long shot,consider these smaller moves that can help get you to a bigger 401(k) balance.
Photo: /Rob Friedman/istockphoto
